thread.title: Chance the Rapper Teases New Future Collaboration: Listen
thread.title_full: Chance the Rapper Teases New Future Collaboration: Listen

author: Sheldon Pearce
title: Chance the Rapper Teases New Future Collaboration: Listen
text:
Chance the Rapper Teases New Future Collaboration: Listen Chance the Rapper (C Flanigan/WireImage), Future (Ollie Millington/Redferns) 
Chance the Rapper took to Instagram to tease a new collaboration with Future . Watch clips below. The song is captioned “#mypeak,” seemingly referencing the title of the track and one clip tags Future’s DJ, Esco. (Future also raps those lyrics in the song’s hook.) Lyrics from the Chance verse include “I just hit the office, that’s the FAFSA/ I don’t want to hear about no masters/ I just hit my pastor, it’s faster” and “I’m a free agent like the second Matrix .” Future previously appeared on the Coloring Book cut “Smoke Break.” A post shared by Chance The Rapper (@chancetherapper) on Feb 20, 2017 at 3:29pm PST A post shared by Chance The Rapper (@chancetherapper) on Feb 20, 2017 at 3:54pm PST Artists In This Story
